job.title: 100% Remote Lead Software Engineer
job.description: Title Remote Lead Software EngineerbrbrHQ San Diego CAbrbrType FullTime  100 RemotebrbrCompensation 150  170k depending on experiencebrbrRequirements 7 years of C NETASPNET and LeadMentoring experiencebrbrBonus NET Core Azure CICD GIT DockerbrbrAre you a Lead Software Engineer with great consumerfacing or publicfacing site experience If so read onbrbrWe need you to help design develop and scale our publicfacing sites You will be leading a small team implementing fullstack solutions enabling us to grow our offerings securely handle increasing traffic build new products and expose functionality for automated testing We are looking for an engineer who loves writing code understands best practices has a strong desire to learn new technologies and wants to collaborate with teammates Our team is a tightlyknit and passionate group that works very well togetherbrbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Work with your dedicated Product Manager to determine priorities plan out releases and assign work to reportslili Create and review tech designs for large features You are responsible for the technical architecture of the system you are building with guidance and support frombrliulour architectbrulli Conduct code reviews to maintain code quality We use code reviews as an opportunity to teach learn and maintain code qualitylili Write code alongside the teamlili Manage 3  5 engineers As a Tech Lead you will need to conduct 1 on 1s and help encourage and facilitate technical growth within your teambrliulHave a handson attitude While its important to delegate work to your reports its also important to be willing to jump in and solve a problem or handle a crisisbrbrWhat You Need for this PositionbrbrAt least 7 years of software development experience and 2  3 years of leadershipmentoring experiencebrulli Strong understanding of NETASPNET andor NET Corelili RESTful API developmentlili Experience building systems to handle large scale while maintaining high availabilitylili A track record of leading projects mentoring peers and collaborating with technical and business partnersbrliulNice to haves Azure and DevOps ToolsbrbrWhats In It for YoubrbrGreat Culture Excellent Health Dental and Vision Insurance 401K Gym MembershipbrbrSo if you are seeking a Remote Lead Software Engineer role and have most of the experience aboveplease apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrNickSavardCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  NS31630396  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulNick Savard  Sr Executive Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required
